
Getting Started Guide
---------------------

This Getting started huid will guide you, step by step on the first configuration and test of the q8 unit
attached to a Qontrol motherboard. 

This guide recuires :

- a computer connected to internet to let the systme download the serial port usb drivers 

- a program for serial port communication (e.g. Teraterm for windows, CoolTerm for Mac Osx, Linux)

\n


Connection of the unit
######################

Configuration of the serial communication
#########################################

First operations and tests
##############################
